page.title: 20OTHER TRANSPORT. CREDITS.
page.content: {CYCLES.} Bicycles are owned by most children, in three designs: Standard: 58% BMX: 23% Sports: 19% Motor cycles are owned by at least one member in 12% of families. {RAIL TRAVEL.}Holidays: 19% Bsness: 34% Stations: Chesterfield, Sheffield and Grindleford. {AIR TRAVEL.} Holidays: 31% Bsness: 7% Airports: East Midlands & Manchester. {SEA TRAVEL.} Holidays: 34% Bsness: 7% Above figures relate to % of families. -------------------------------------- {CREDITS The information has been prepared by children of Baslow St. Anne's C.E. Primary School and the Headmaster, I. Lumsden. We are grateful to Mr. D.M.Thorp of Gorse Bank Farm, Mr. J. Cartledge (builder), and to those parents who provided transport.
